p: It is focused on the energy-mix of nuclear and renewable energies in this work. These two kinds of energy resources have pros and cons for carbon emissions control. Although renewable energy has been considered the best way to keep carbon neutrality, there is a side effect of carbon production. In the case of photosynthesis, the carbon is transformed into a stable chemical compound (Stile, 2021). However, during the burring, carbons are released into the atmosphere. It is required to manage the side effect of renewable energy, which is described in the modeling.
